snippet.title: Ships At Sea - Official Gameplay Trailer - 4K
snippet.description:
Discover new ships, enter the shipyard, play with your friends and enjoy many more new features. 

Ships At Sea is our new upcoming next-gen ship simulator.

Experience the thrill of navigating a wide range of ships. Immerse yourself in various career paths, such as service, cargo and commercial fishing as you explore the breathtaking open world of Norway´s Lofoten Islands with its stunning scenery, either alone, or together with your friends. The ocean is within your reach!

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1266540/Ships_At_Sea/
